1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin Shu'aib from his father, that his grandfather said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'When the two circumcised parts meet, and (the tip of the penis) disappears, then bath is obligatory

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي وُجُوبِ الْغُسْلِ مِنَ الْتِقَاءِ الْخِتَانَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated about the obligation of bath when the two circumcised parts meet
